@template homepage_template
{{html:
<head>
<style type="text/css">
        .videoMain iframe {-webkit-border-radius: 5px;-moz-border-radius: 5px;border-radius: 5px;box-shadow: 0px 0px 9px #06a7e2;} 
        .bigButtonSignUp {margin-top: -66px;margin-bottom: -42px;}
        .borderRight1 { border-right: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6); } 
        .borderRight1 + .col-md-6 ul { padding-left: 20px; }
        .borderRight1 + .col-md-6 ul li { color: #FFF;font-size: 16px;font-weight: bold;list-style: initial; }
        .nav-stacked li {margin: 19px 0;}
        .nav-stacked { margin-top: 15px; margin-bottom: -5px; }
        .nav-stacked li a {display: block;padding: 9px 19px;color: #e4e4e4;}
        .nav-stacked li a strong {color: #FFF;}
        .videoBox2 { background: rgba(6,167,226,0.2);-webkit-border-radius: 5px;-moz-border-radius: 5px;border-radius: 5px;box-shadow: 0px 0px 9px #06a7e2;}
        .nav-pills>li.active>a, .nav-pills>li.active>a:hover, .nav-pills>li.active>a:focus {background: rgba(0,143,237,0.5);}
        .marginTop15 {margin-top: -63px;margin-bottom: 45px;}
        .tab-pane video { border: 1px solid #06a7e2;}
        .marginTop {margin-top: -7px;margin-bottom: 20px;}
        .leftIcon {margin: 0 0 50px 210px;}
         @media (max-width: 768px) {
               .bigButtonSignUp {margin-top: 45px !important;margin-bottom: -12px !important;text-align: center !important;}
               .borderRight1 { border-right: 0; }
               .borderRight1 + .col-md-6 ul li { list-style: none; }
               .borderRight1 img { margin-left: -50px; }

               .borderRight1 + .col-md-6 ul li { list-style: none; }
               .borderRight1 img { margin-left: -50px; }
            }
            @media (max-width: 1290px) and (min-width: 992px) {
                .borderRight1 img { margin-left: -50px; }

                .borderRight1 + .col-md-6 ul li { list-style: none; }

        <div class="carousel-inner">
          <div class="item active">

            </ul>

            </p>
          </div>
          <div class="item">
            <p class="font mainText"> Designed to fit your needs<br>
            <ul class="arrow">
              <li>Usage based.</li>
              <li>Microsoft Windows and Linux.</li>
              <li>Flexible disk sizes.</li>
            </ul>
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector btn-info btn-large mainButton" onClick="location.href='/$$space/Machine Deck'">Read more</button>

      <div class="col-md-6">
        <ul>
          <li>Sign Up for our 2-week Trial</li>

          <li>No automatic credit card charges</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="marginTop">
  <div class="container">

Unprecedented speed and security available 'everyware anyware'. <a href="../$$space/Why">Read more <i class="fa fa-circle-arrow-right"></i></a> </div>
      </p>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <script>
    $(function() {
      $('a[data-toggle="tab"]').on('shown.bs.tab', function (e) {
        if (e.relatedTarget) {
          var video = $($(e.relatedTarget).attr('href')).find('video')[0];
          video.pause();
          video.load();
        }

        $($(e.target).attr('href')).find('video')[0].play();
      })
    })
